General.Name: Inversora Juramento SA
General.Description: Inversora Juramento S.A. operates as an agricultural and livestock company in the northwestern region of Argentina. The company engages in the production, industrialization, marketing, and sale of meat and agricultural products. Its agricultural products include soy, sorghum, alfalfa, pastures, and corn. The company has approximately 89,504 hectares of land located in the province of Salta. It also exports its products. Inversora Juramento S.A. was founded in 1990 and is based in Salta, Argentina.
